article.title: Johnston Assigned to Air Force Undersecretary Post
article.author: Henry Kenyon

tags.tag: Office of the Undersecretary of the Air Force

article.text: Maj. Gen. Richard C. Johnston, USAF, has been assigned assistant deputy undersecretary of the Air Force, international affairs, Office of the Undersecretary of the Air Force, Pentagon, Washington, D.C.
